scripts.rubyStyle: docker compose run --rm web rubocop --plugin rubocop-airbnb
scripts.javascriptStyle: docker compose run --rm web npx eslint .
scripts.compileAssets: docker compose run --rm web bundle exec vite build --mode development
scripts.clobberAssets: docker compose run --rm web bundle exec vite clobber --mode development
scripts.credentials: docker compose run --rm web bash -c "EDITOR=nano rails credentials:edit"
scripts.test:vitest: docker compose run -e "RAILS_ENV=test" -e "NODE_ENV=test" --rm web yarn vitest run
scripts.test:vitest:coverage: docker compose run -e "RAILS_ENV=test" -e "NODE_ENV=test" --rm web yarn vitest run --coverage
scripts.test:compileAssets: docker compose run -e "RAILS_ENV=test" -e "NODE_ENV=test" --rm web bundle exec vite build --mode test
scripts.test:rspec: docker compose run -e "RAILS_ENV=test" -e "NODE_ENV=test" --rm web bundle exec rspec
scripts.docker:prune: docker system prune -a && docker volume prune -a
